001package game;
002import java.util.ArrayList;
003import java.util.Random;
004
005
006
007/**
008 * TransporterRoom class - a room that transports the player to a random room.
009 * @author Christophe TARATIBU
010 * @version 2025/2026 (09.01.2026)
011 */
012public class TransporterRoom extends Room {
013    /** List of possible rooms */
014    private ArrayList<Room> aPossibleRooms;
015    /** Chosen room */
016    private Room aChosenRoom;
017
018    /**
019     * Initialization of a transporter room
020     * @param pDescription Room's description
021     * @param pImage An image used to show the room
022     * @param pRoomName The name of the room
023     */
024    public TransporterRoom(String pDescription,final String pImage, final String pRoomName) {
025        super(pDescription,pImage,pRoomName);
026        this.aPossibleRooms = new ArrayList<Room>();
027        this.aChosenRoom = null;
028    }
029
030    /**
031     * Sets the possible destination rooms
032     * @param pRooms The list of possible rooms
033     */
034    public void setDestinations(ArrayList<Room> pRooms) {
035        this.aPossibleRooms = pRooms;
036    }
037
038    /**
039     * Gives the room's exit in the given direction.
040     * @return The chosen room.
041     */
042    public Room getChosenRoom() {
043        return this.aChosenRoom;
044    }
045
046
047    /**
048     * Sets the chosen room according to the random number
049     * @param pRngNumber The random number
050     */
051    public void setChosenRoom(final int pRngNumber){
052        this.aChosenRoom = this.aPossibleRooms.get(pRngNumber);
053    }
054
055    /**
056     * Gives the room's exit in the given direction.
057     * @return The chosen room.
058     */
059    public int getRngNumber(){
060        Random vRandom = new Random();
061        return vRandom.nextInt(this.aPossibleRooms.size());
062    }
063
064    /**
065     * Get the index of a room in the possible destinations by its name.
066     * Used by the alea command to control random behavior in tests.
067     * @param pRoomName The name of the room to find
068     * @return The index of the room in aPossibleRooms, or -1 if not found
069     */
070    public int getIndexForRoomName(final String pRoomName) {
071        for (int i = 0; i < this.aPossibleRooms.size(); i++) {
072            if (this.aPossibleRooms.get(i).getRoomName().equals(pRoomName)) {
073                return i;
074            }
075        }
076        return -1;
077    }
078
079    /**
080     * Resets the chosen room to null
081     */
082    public void resetChosenRoom() {
083        this.aChosenRoom = null;
084    }
085
086}
